translations: （尤指因为年龄而）精神衰退；失去理智
痴呆症；患有痴呆症的人；疯子

sentences.sentence: Dementing illnesses comprise Alzheimer's disease (AD), Pick's disease, Multi infarct dementia (MID) and other neurological disorders. These diseases have different clinical characters respectively.
sentences.translation: 痴呆类疾病可分为阿尔茨海默病(AD)、皮克病、多发性梗死性痴呆(MID)等类型，它们各具不同的临床特点。
